languages.text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.
languages.original_text: Защищает Кикеросс <b>Покровом теней<b> на 1 раунд, который позволяет ей избежать урона от следующей атаки или атакующей способности врага.

traits.locale_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 round, which allows her to avoid damage from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

languages.original_text: Grants Shadow Protection to Keykeross for 1 round, which allows her to avoid damage from the next attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、キーケロスに影の保護を与え、それにより彼女は敵の次の攻撃や攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を避けることができる。
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

traits.locale_text: 1ラウンドの間、キーケロスに影の保護を与え、それにより彼女は敵の次の攻撃や攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるダメージを避けることができる。

languages.text: 绮克萝丝获得“阴影庇护”效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。绮克萝丝下次承受的攻击或攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不会造成任何{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

traits.locale_text: 绮克萝丝获得“阴影庇护”效果，持续一轮。绮克萝丝下次承受的攻击或攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不会造成任何伤害。

languages.text: Concede protección sombría a Keykeross durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, lo que le permite evitar el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del siguiente ataque o la siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de ataque de un enemigo.
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

traits.locale_text: Concede protección sombría a Keykeross durante 1 asalto, lo que le permite evitar el daño del siguiente ataque o la siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de ataque de un enemigo.

languages.text: Gewährt Keykeross 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang "Schattenschutz", wodurch sie {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den nächsten Angriff oder die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Angriffsfähigkeit{/g} ihres Feindes vermeidet.
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt Keykeross 1 Runde lang Schattenschutz, wodurch sie Schaden durch den nächsten Angriff oder die nächste Angriffs{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}fähigkeit{/g} ihres Feindes vermeidet.

languages.text: Confère à Keykeross une protection ombreuse pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, ce qui lui permet d'échapper aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de l'attaque suivante ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} associée à l'attaque de son ennemi.
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.

traits.locale_text: Confère à Keykeross une protection contre les ombres pendant 1 round, ce qui lui permet d'échapper aux dégâts de l'attaque suivante ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} associée à l'attaque de son ennemi.

languages.text: Keykeross'a gölge koruması sağlar. Bu sayede düşmanının bir sonraki saldırısından veya saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinden{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} almaz. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Grants shadow protection to Keykeross for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, which allows her to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack or attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of her enemy.
